content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for coming to view the apartment, Ms. Müller. I think we can come to an agreement on the rental price. Would you like to make an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to make an offer of 450 Euros per month. Is that within your budget?

If not, I am willing to negotiate further.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Ms. Müller. While 450 Euros per month is certainly a reasonable amount, I would like to negotiate further to see if we can come to an even higher rental price. Would you be willing to consider a higher offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I am open to negotiation. What do you have in mind?

If I am not able to agree to your proposed price, I will terminate the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Great, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In that case, I would like to propose a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This is based on the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in the area. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price that would be beneficial for both of us. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine
